paper_abstract: In addition to conventional information media such as newspaper, radio, and television, modern network media such as e-mail and Web page has become popular means of proliferating information. However, the number of Web page is so large that they need to be managed systematically. Therefore, this work presents a component-based Web page management environment, which: (1) enables high-level modeling capability of Web pages through components, (2) improves maintenance of Web applications, and (3) facilitates the reuse of Web page components.
